subject: Science
title: The Asteroid Belt
description: Learn The Asteroid Belt in one minute.

hook.text: Between Mars and Jupiter lies a ring of rocky debris called the asteroid belt.

buildup.text: Movies show it as a dense field. In reality, asteroids are millions of km apart.

discovery.text: Jupiter's gravity prevented this material from ever forming into a planet.

twist.text: The entire belt has less mass than 4% of the Moon.

climax.text: Ceres, the largest object there, was promoted to dwarf planet in 2006.

punchline.text: The asteroid belt is mostly empty space. Hollywood lied.

quiz.question: Why didn't the asteroid belt form into a planet?
